title: standard_space_roi
description: Masks input and/or reduces its FOV based on a standard space image or mask, transformed into the space of the input image.

mask_fov_flag.title: Mask FOV
mask_fov_flag.description: Mask output using transformed standard space FOV

mask_mask.title: Mask using standard space mask
mask_mask.description: Mask output using transformed standard space mask

roi_fov_flag.title: Cut down FOV using standard space bounding box
roi_fov_flag.description: Cut down input FOV using bounding box of the transformed standard space FOV

roi_mask.title: Cut down FOV using standard space mask
roi_mask.description: Cut down input FOV using nonbackground bounding box of the transformed standard space mask

roi_none_flag.title: Do not cut down input FOV
roi_none_flag.description: Do not cut down input FOV

ss_ref.title: Standard space reference image
ss_ref.description: Standard space reference image to use (default: /usr/local/fsl/data/standard/MNI152_T1)

alt_input.title: Alternative input image
alt_input.description: Alternative input image to apply the ROI to (instead of the one used to register to the reference)
